rules_text:
Return target permanent you control to its owner’s hand.
[i](You start the game with a tactic deck of one copy each of Advance, Besiege, Provision, Retreat, and Scout. If Retreat would be put into your graveyard, shuffle it into your tactic deck instead.)[/i]
